009
010package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
011
012import imagingbook.common.color.adapt.BradfordAdaptation;
013import imagingbook.common.color.adapt.ChromaticAdaptation;
014import imagingbook.common.color.gamma.ModifiedGammaMapping;
015import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
016
017import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
018
019import static imagingbook.common.color.cie.StandardIlluminant.D50;
020import static imagingbook.common.color.cie.StandardIlluminant.D65;
021
022
023/**
024 * Defines a linear RGB space with the same white point and primaries as sRGB. Everything is D65, components of all
025 * {@code float[]} colors are supposed to be in [0,1]. This is a singleton class with no public constructors, use
026 * {@link #getInstance()} to obtain the single instance.
027 *
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2022/11/14
030 * @see sRGB65ColorSpace
031 */
032@SuppressWarnings("serial")
033public class LinearRgb65ColorSpace extends AbstractRgbColorSpace implements DirectD65Conversion {
034
035        /** Matrix for conversion from D65-based XYZ to linear RGB. */
036        private final float[][] MrgbiF; // = Matrix.toFloat(this.getMrgbi());
037        
038        /** Matrix for conversion from linear RGB to D65-based XYZ (inverse of {@code Mrgbi}). */
039        private final float[][] MrgbF; // = Matrix.toFloat(this.getMrgb());
040        
041        private static final ChromaticAdaptation catD65toD50 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D65, D50);
042        private static final ChromaticAdaptation catD50toD65 = BradfordAdaptation.getInstance(D50, D65);
043        private static final ModifiedGammaMapping GammaMap = ModifiedGammaMapping.sRGB;
044
045        // tristimulus values (ITU-709):
046        private static final double xR = 0.64, yR = 0.33;
047        private static final double xG = 0.30, yG = 0.60;
048        private static final double xB = 0.15, yB = 0.06;
049        // white point:
050        private static final double[] xyW = D65.getXy();
051
052        
053        private static final LinearRgb65ColorSpace instance = new LinearRgb65ColorSpace();
054        
055        public static LinearRgb65ColorSpace getInstance() {
056                return instance;
057        }
058        
059        /** Constructor, non-public */
060        private LinearRgb65ColorSpace() {
061                super(xR, yR, xG, yG, xB, yB, xyW[0], xyW[1]);  //      super(0.64, 0.33, 0.30, 0.60, 0.15, 0.06, 0.3127, 0.3290);
062                // super(ColorSpace.TYPE_RGB, 3);
063                this.MrgbiF = Matrix.toFloat(this.getMrgbi());
064                this.MrgbF = Matrix.toFloat(this.getMrgb());
065        }
066        
067        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------
068        
069        @Override
070        public float[] toCIEXYZ65(float[] rgb) {
071                float[] xyz65 = Matrix.multiply(MrgbiF, rgb);
072                return xyz65;
073        }
074        
075        @Override
076        public float[] fromCIEXYZ65(float[] xyz65) {
077                float[] rgb = Matrix.multiply(MrgbF, xyz65);
078                return rgb;
079        }
080        
081
082        // --------------------------------------------------------------------
083
084        @Override       // directly convert non-linear sRGB to THIS linear rgb (D65-based)
085        public float[] fromRGB(float[] srgb) {
086                float[] rgb = GammaMap.applyInv(srgb);
087                return rgb;
088        }
089
090        @Override       // directly convert THIS linear rgb (D65-based) to non-linear sRGB
091        public float[] toRGB(float[] rgb) {
092                float[] srgb = GammaMap.applyFwd(rgb);
093                return srgb;
094        }
095        
096        // --------------------------------------------------------------------
097        
098        @Override       // return D50-based PCS xyz from THIS linear rgb
099        public float[] toCIEXYZ(float[] rgb) {
100                float[] xyz65 = this.toCIEXYZ65(rgb);
101                float[] xyz50 = catD65toD50.applyTo(xyz65);
102                return xyz50;
103        }
104        
105
106        @Override       // return THIS linear rgb from D50-based PCS xyz
107        public float[] fromCIEXYZ(float[] xyz50) {
108                float[] xyz65 = catD50toD65.applyTo(xyz50);
109                return this.fromCIEXYZ65(xyz65);
110        }
111        
112}
